title: Get a random sample of rows
sql:
select employee_id, first_name                   EMPLOYEE_ID FIRST_NAME          
from   hr.employees sample ( 5 );                ----------- --------------------
                                                         129 Laura               
                                                         130 Mozhe               
                                                         194 Samuel 


select count(*)                                     COUNT(*)
from   hr.employees sample ( 50 );               -----------
                                                          49

select count(*)                                     COUNT(*)
from   hr.employees sample ( 50 );               -----------
                                                          58

explanations.text: Fetch a random sample of 5% of the rows
Get a random sample of half the rows
The sampling is random, so running the same query will return different rows
